channel.title: Comments on: A Farewell to Ironforge

item.title: By: Dreaming
item.dc:creator: Dreaming
item.description:
I have yet to see the outlands, mostly because my new paladin main is more important.
Hey, someone had to re-roll for the guild.
item.content:encoded:
I have yet to see the outlands, mostly because my new paladin main is more important.

Hey, someone had to re-roll for the guild.

item.title: By: Keystone
item.dc:creator: Keystone
item.description:
I only took half a day off work because I figured Blizz would have massive server problems, boy was I wrong. Grats to Blizzard on the nice release.
As for the forge, I won't be back, because Stormwind is my stomping grounds!
item.content:encoded:
I only took half a day off work because I figured Blizz would have massive server problems, boy was I wrong. Grats to Blizzard on the nice release.

As for the forge, I won’t be back, because Stormwind is my stomping grounds!

item.title: By: Bluekar
item.dc:creator: Bluekar
item.description: I was so sure the servers would be down and not fixed for a whole week!!!! Blizzard sucks at being unreliable too! :( Poor me.
item.content:encoded: I was so sure the servers would be down and not fixed for a whole week!!!! Blizzard sucks at being unreliable too! üôÅ Poor me.

item.title: By: gablaxian
item.dc:creator: gablaxian
item.description:
do you forget that some of the cool new instances are back in Azeroth? Karazhan... Caverns of Time...
you'll be back... oh yes. you'll be back... mua haha HAHAHA! *ahem*
item.content:encoded:
do you forget that some of the cool new instances are back in Azeroth? Karazhan… Caverns of Time…

you’ll be back… oh yes. you’ll be back… mua haha HAHAHA! *ahem*

item.title: By: Prophetik
item.dc:creator: Prophetik
item.description: Oh, you'll be back. There is definitely no AH in Outlands, or class trainers :P
item.content:encoded: Oh, you’ll be back. There is definitely no AH in Outlands, or class trainers üòõ

item.title: By: BigFreak
item.dc:creator: BigFreak
item.description: Gonna try and get into work half hour early in the hope my boss'll let me leave early. Not quite as bad as people who've booked the day off :(
item.content:encoded: Gonna try and get into work half hour early in the hope my boss’ll let me leave early. Not quite as bad as people who’ve booked the day off üôÅ

item.title: By: MrOrange
item.dc:creator: MrOrange
item.description: You know, i find it outright SAD or revealing, that so many "bloggers" play alliance. Pop on Lums links and start counting rofl.
item.content:encoded:
You know, i find it outright SAD or revealing, that so many “bloggers” play alliance.
Pop on Lums links and start counting rofl.
